paper.title: Empirical of the Taiwan stock index option price forecasting model - applied artificial neural network
paper.abstract: This work presents a novel neural network model for forecasting option prices using past volatilities and other options market factors. Out of different approaches to estimating volatility in the option pricing model, this study uses backpropagation neural network to forecast prices for Taiwanese stock index options. The ability to develop accurate forecasts of grey prediction volatility enables practitioners to establish an appropriate hedging strategy at in-the-money option.

domain_result.justification: 该论文的核心技术是使用人工神经网络预测台湾股票指数期权的价格，这直接涉及衍生品定价领域。论文明确提到利用神经网络模型来预测期权价格，并讨论了波动率估计在期权定价模型中的应用，这些都是衍生品定价的关键问题。
